pages.text: A big $(item)Thank You$() to these people in no particular order.$(br2)$(item)Vyraal$() & $(item)Saereth$() for suggesting new feature(s) to the mod and adding it to their modpack $(item)Interactions$().$(br2)$(item)tommyTT$() for adding additional config options.
$(item)Darkosto$() & $(item)Slowpoke101$() for adding the mod to their modpacks $(item)SkyFactory 4$() and $(item)FTB Sky Odyssey$() respectively.
